<?php
 namespace blobfolio\wp\wh\vendor\phone\data; class dataGL extends data { const CODE = 'GL'; const PREFIX = 299; const REGION = 'North America'; const PATTERNS = array( '(?:19|[2-689]\d)\d{4}', ); const TYPES = array( '(?:19|3[1-7]|6[14689]|8[14-79]|9\d)\d{4}'=>array( 'fixed', ), '(?:[25][1-9]|4[2-9])\d{4}'=>array( 'mobile', ), '80\d{4}'=>array( 'toll_free', ), '3[89]\d{4}'=>array( 'voip', ), ); const FORMATS = array( '(\d{2})(\d{2})(\d{2})'=>'$1 $2 $3', ); }
